content: S-MD 12-14 HWH #5 SS304 Self-drilling metal screws Self-drilling screw (A2 stainless steel) with 5/16 washer for thick metal-to-metal fastenings (up to 0.59 inch) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling screw for fast assembly in one step Perfect Sealing (PS) feature – specially engineered geometry below the head which prevents over-compression of the EPDM washer, helping to more reliably seal out water Fast and robust drill tip for use on high-strength steel (up to grade S 450 GD) with Racing Tip technology – a wave-form cutting edge which removes chips much faster and helps prevent point burn-out For more reliable fastenings with defined load values Applications Fastening sheet metal and profiles to steel substructures and framing, with or without intermediate insulation layers Stainless steel (A2) for fastening in mildly corrosive environments Thick metal-to-metal connections (up to 0.59 inch) For applications requiring watertight fastenings with 5/16 washer For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw drive/recess type: Hexagon 8 Base materials: Carbon steel, Aluminium Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution Technical Data | Screw drive/recess type | Hexagon 8 | Base materials | Carbon steel, Aluminium | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2322187 - Screw S-MD 12-14 x 4 HWH #5 SS304 - Package Size 100 pc
